page.title: 15Housing
page.content: There is a Council housing estate at Weir Place Kirton and some Council houses in meadowlands. There are four modern private housing estates in Kirton, Meadowlands, Gustom Gardens, Grey's Orchard and Croxton Close. Some former farm labourers cottages have been bought up, modernised and enlarged by private individuals.Eight tied cottages remain at Falkenham and five at Trimley St. Martin. Also there are 8 old peoples bungalows in Falkenham. On the whole private property in Falkenham is more expensive than in Kirton. At present Falkenham Hall is up for sale at Â£127,000 and a bungalow opposite at Â£ 85,000.
